scripts.build: npm run react-build && npm run extract-react && gulp build
scripts.react-build: cd react-app && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.extract-react: npm run copy-react-files && npm run extract-react-tags
scripts.copy-react-files: npm run copy-react-css-files && npm run copy-react-js-files && npm run copy-react-media-files
scripts.copy-react-css-files: shx rm src/css/react/* && shx cp react-app/build/static/css/* src/css/react/
scripts.copy-react-js-files: shx rm src/js/react/* && shx cp react-app/build/static/js/* src/js/react/
scripts.copy-react-media-files: shx rm src/images/react/static/media/* && shx cp react-app/build/static/media/* src/images/react/static/media
